name: DemiDato: Monster Dating Show
description:
You're on TV - monster TV! ♡

Welcome to the set of the monster world's biggest dating show, DemiDato! Your protagonist (with your choice of name and pronouns) is a plucky human in a silly hood, the latest contestant to team up with the show's notoriously snarky host Paul T. Geist on live TV. 

It's time to find your very own demihuman date! But if you can't win anyone over, you must risk leaving the show utterly dateless

Good luck! You might need it!

DemiDato features:

  • A whopping 12 dateable characters, with multiple ways to arrive at each character's ending, and more than one silly bad end to find!
  • Bite-size routes - one run of the game can be completed in under an hour, making it perfect for streaming, and easy to replay. Experience as many routes and character endings as you like - each branch after the intro is a new story!
  • Nameable protagonist with an inclusive choice of pronouns
  • VN crafted as a love letter to 'monster girl' tropes and real life dating shows like If You Are The One and Take Me Out - and armed with many puns to poke gentle fun at all of it ♡
  • Slick, slightly cheesy reality TV nostalgia baked in throughout our bespoke original soundtrack and UI.


  • timepatches (project lead, co-writer, UI artist, additional art)
  • Jane Titor & Red-Chan (co-writers)
  • VividGrim (character design, CG background & painting) 
  • yapsharlene (sprites & CG character art) & spaceoutstation (sprites)
  • YMRED (music)
  • Selavi Games (background art)
  • Lunaterra (editing)

For a full list of credits and assets used, visit our website.
